title: Dundalk Coastal Ireland Escape with Rooftop Restaurant
description: Make the most of your Irish escape when you stay at Crowne Plaza Dundalk, an IHG Hotel, located between Dublin and Belfast along the coast. Enjoy spellbinding views of the Irish Sea in between delightful pub-style meals at Fourteen Below Bar & Restaurant, or take the romance up a notch at the upscale Roof Top Restaurant and savour spellbinding ocean and mountain panoramas while sipping crafty cocktails and signature dishes.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Dundalk, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Green Park, Inner Relief Road, Dundalk, County Louth, A91 EF88, Ireland
